task.question: In what year of Belshazzar did Daniel have his second vision (Dan 8:1)?
In Daniel’s “Ram and Goat” vision where did he see himself (Dan 8:2)?
During whose reign did Daniel have his “Ram and Goat” vision (Dan 8:1)?
Where in Susa did Daniel see himself in the “Ram and Goat” vision (Dan 8:2)?

choices.choice: By the gate and road to Nuzu
By the temple of Sulgi god of Susa

task.question: What was standing before Daniel in his vision at the Ulai Canal in Susa (Dan 8:3)?

choices.choice: A lamb with a fleece white as snow
A lion with two wings of an eagle

task.question: What was unique about the ram which Daniel saw in his vision (Dan 89:3)?

choices.choice: It had one horn was longer than the other
It had the legs of a horse
It flew on the wings of an eagle
It walked upright like a man

task.answer: It had one horn was longer than the other

task.question: The ram Daniel saw in his vision charged in all of the following directions EXCEPT (Dan 8:4)
Where did the goat come from in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:5)?
What was unique about how the goat traveled in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:5)?

choices.choice: It did not touch the earth
It rode on the back of the ram
It was carried on a chariot

task.answer: It did not touch the earth

task.question: What did the ram do in Daniel’s vision (Dan 8:7)?

choices.choice: Struck and pierced the city wall
Carried the ram to a safe place
Struck and shattered the ram’s two horns

task.answer: Struck and shattered the ram’s two horns
